mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (admin, name, address, phone, classification, number, description, imgDesc, img, region) VALUES(#{admin}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{classification}, #{number}, #{description}, #{imgDesc}, #{img}, #{region})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop order by id desc
SELECT * FROM shop WHERE (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')) AND classification = 0 order by id desc
SELECT * FROM shop WHERE (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')) AND classification = 1 order by id desc

SELECT shop.id, shop.admin, shop.name, shop.address, shop.phone, shop.classification, shop.number, shop.description, shop.imgDesc, shop.img, shop.region FROM shop, shop_category, category WHERE shop.id = shop_category.shop AND shop_category.code = category.code AND (shop.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR shop.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR category.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')) AND classification = 0 order by shop.id desc LIMIT 12

SELECT shop.id, shop.admin, shop.name, shop.address, shop.phone, shop.classification, shop.number, shop.description, shop.imgDesc, shop.img, shop.region FROM shop, shop_category, category WHERE shop.id = shop_category.shop AND shop_category.code = category.code AND (shop.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR shop.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR category.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')) AND classification = 1 order by shop.id desc LIMIT 12

SELECT shop.id, shop.admin, shop.name, shop.address, shop.phone, shop.classification, shop.number, shop.description, shop.imgDesc, shop.img, shop.region FROM shop, (SELECT shop_category.id, shop_category.shop, shop_category.code FROM category, shop_category WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') AND category.code = shop_category.code) AS ctgr WHERE (shop.classification = 0) AND (shop.id = ctgr.shop) AND shop.id IN (SELECT shop FROM product WHERE price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice} AND region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')) order by shop.id desc

SELECT shop.id, shop.admin, shop.name, shop.address, shop.phone, shop.classification, shop.number, shop.description, shop.imgDesc, shop.img, shop.region FROM shop, (SELECT shop_category.id, shop_category.shop, shop_category.code FROM category, shop_category WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') AND category.code = shop_category.code) AS ctgr WHERE (shop.classification = 1) AND (shop.id = ctgr.shop) AND shop.id IN (SELECT shop FROM product WHERE price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice} AND region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')) order by shop.id desc
